description:
This course will show you how to design the life you want; how to form step-by-step plans to create it; how to develop an unshakable self-confidence in your ability to succeed and how to persevere until you are living the life of your dreams.

It consists of video lessons, meditation / visualization exercises, a workbook with fill in the blank templates and information about my You Tube channel where you can get more information.
title: How to Improve Your Life in Five Simple Steps
